gov.va.vinci.leo.descriptors

Interface LeoDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LeoAEDescriptor, LeoRemoteAEDescriptor

    public interface LeoDelegate
    Common API interface for Remote and Local Analysis Engine Delegates. User: Thomas Ginter Date: 10/30/13 Time: 1:29 PM

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceSpecifier

        org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceSpecifier getResourceSpecifier()
        Return a reference to the internal ResourceSpecifier that is the backend model for the delegate. AnalysisEngines will have a ResourceSpecifier that is an instance of AnalysisEngineDescription whereas remote delegates have a ResourceSpecifier that is a CustomResourceSpecifier.
        Returns:
        ResourceSpecifier object for this delegate

      • setDescriptorLocator

        <T extends LeoDelegate> T setDescriptorLocator(URI descriptorLocator)
        Set the location where the descriptor should be generated. If a file name is specified it will be ignored and the parent directory path will be used instead.
        Type Parameters:
        T - reference to this LeoAEDescriptor object instance for builder pattern
        Parameters:
        descriptorLocator - URI path where the descriptors should be located
        Returns:
        reference to the delegate type whose name is set

      • getDescriptorLocator

        String getDescriptorLocator()
        Returns:
        Descriptor locator for the AnalysisEngineDescriptor xml file represented by this LeoAEDescriptor object or null if the locator is not set.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of this delegate.
        Returns:
        String representing the name of this delegate

      • setName

        <T extends LeoDelegate> T setName(String name)
                              throws IOException
        Set the name of this delegate, return a reference to the delegate type object in each implementation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - delegate return type
        Parameters:
        name - String name of the delegate to set
        Returns:
        reference to the delegate type whose name is set
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error setting the name of the delegate descriptor

      • isDeleteOnExit

        boolean isDeleteOnExit()
        Returns TRUE if the generated descriptors will be deleted when the program exits. Default is TRUE.
        Returns:
        TRUE if descriptors will be deleted

      • setIsDeleteOnExit

        <T extends LeoDelegate> T setIsDeleteOnExit(boolean deleteOnExit)
        Set the flag to TRUE if generated descriptors should be deleted when the program exits, FALSE to persist them.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type template for extending classes.
        Parameters:
        deleteOnExit - true if the descriptors should auto delete
        Returns:
        reference to the delegate type instance whose flag was set

      • toXML

        void toXML()
           throws Exception
        Write the descriptor file out based on the locator information in the object. If there is no locator information then a temp file is generated and the location stored.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an error serializing the XML

      • toXML

        void toXML(String filename)
           throws Exception
        Write the descriptor out to a temp XML file with the name provided as the base filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - Base filename for the XML file
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an error serializing the XML

      • analysisEngineSection

        <T extends LeoDelegate> T analysisEngineSection(TransformerHandler thd,
                                              boolean isTopDescriptor)
                                            throws SAXException
        Produce the Analysis Engine section for the Deployment Descriptor XML.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type template for extending classes.
        Parameters:
        thd - TransformerHandler for SAX XML output
        isTopDescriptor - if true then this is the top descriptor in the remote deployment
        Returns:
        Reference to the delegate type object from which the analysisEngineSection was generated
        Throws:
        SAXException - If there is an error serializing the XML
